shippingPolicy.title: Shipping, Delivery, and Inspection Policy
deliveryTimeDetails: Orders will be shipped within 24 hours or as per contract progress.
For distant provinces, delivery may take 7–15 days, depending on product status and weather.
Delivery time is calculated from the order confirmation to receipt of goods.
If delivery is delayed beyond 10 days, customers may cancel at no cost.
logisticsDetails: Logistics partners must provide necessary documents during delivery.
punkgashop.vn will supply all relevant documents to logistics services and recipients.
All orders are pre-packed and sealed by punkgashop.vn.
Delivery is under "sealed package" condition, with a delivery note that includes recipient details.
Carriers must provide invoices to authorities upon request.
All packages are labeled with recipient name, phone, and address.
A valid sales invoice may be included in the parcel (if any); e-invoices will be emailed after customer confirmation.
Sales invoices support complaint handling, market value assessment, and legal circulation verification.
inspectionDetails: Customers may request to inspect the product before accepting delivery.
If incorrect items are delivered, customers can return the order without payment.
If prepaid and the order is incorrect, customers can request a refund or a correct replacement.
Contact support@punkga.me or +84 961 292 594 for refund or exchange requests.

paymentPolicy.conditionsContent1: This payment policy applies to all products available on the website.
paymentPolicy.conditionsContent2: Applicable to customers within our delivery coverage area.

returnPolicy.title: Return and Exchange Policy
returnPolicy.scopeContent: Products damaged due to shipping or manufacturing defects can be exchanged within 12 hours.
conditionsDetails: Return requests must be made within 7 days.
Products must retain original packaging and labels.
Each product can be exchanged once.
No exchange for products outside the return window or without defects.
returnPolicy.beforeDeliveryContent: Contact the sales agent to switch items.
defectiveDetails: You may request a replacement at no cost if due to supplier fault.
If customer-caused defects: No responsibility on the supplier.
Exchange requests will incur shipping and price difference fees (if any), subject to mutual agreement.
returnPolicy.nonDefectiveContent: If customers change their mind, they must meet the following:
nonDefectiveDetails: Products must be sealed and packaged.
Product must not be a custom or special-order item.
All related costs (e.g., shipping) will be borne by the customer.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: PunkgaShop is committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with the law.
purposeDetails: We collect customer information for the following purposes:
To support customers: purchasing, payment, and delivery.
To provide product information, services, and support upon customer request.
To send notifications about our latest programs and products.
To resolve issues that arise during the purchasing process.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectedDetails: We collect customer personal information when placing orders on the website, including: Full name; Email address; Phone number; Address.
privacyPolicy.retentionPeriodDetails: Customer personal data will be stored until the customer requests deletion or deletes it themselves by logging in. In all other cases, personal information will be securely stored on the server of punkgashop.vn.
privacyPolicy.usageScope: 4. Parties or Organizations with Access to Information
usageScopeDetails: Shipping providers: Will receive name, address, and phone number for delivery purposes.
Company staff: Assigned departments will use the information to support customers during product use.
Partner programs, joint operations, outsourcing services: These may access information for the purposes stated in Section 1, with personal data privacy requirements applied.
Legal obligations: We may disclose personal data when required by law and reasonably necessary to comply with legal processes.
Business transfers: In case of merger or acquisition, the buyer will have the right to access and maintain stored personal information.
